timeline.bodyText:
The problem with this code is that the discrepancy between the properties set using the Properties and that are already present in the connection string.
Do you know what takes precedence in that case?
timeline.author: psudheer21

replies.bodyText:
does it matter? This would be a user input problem. if the user sets inconsistent properties, they'd get an error.
Based on my understanding of the hikari code, it looks to me that the properties set via code override the ones already in the jdbcUrl connection string.
replies.author: raffaelespazzoli

replies.bodyText: If it does override, i believe we should be good with this change,
replies.author: psudheer21

timeline.author: psudheer21
psudheer21
psudheer21

replies.bodyText: I didn't touch this, but tried to fix it anyway.
replies.author: raffaelespazzoli

timeline.message: Enabling support for the full jdbcURL to be specified in the config file.
Enabling support for the full jdbcURL to be specified in the config file.
